text: Narodnyy Klub Veres Rivne is a Ukrainian football club based in Rivne. The team ran into financial problems after the winter break of the 2010–11 season and was removed from the Ukrainian Second League.Expelled from the PFL due to their financial situation. (April 29, 2011) Between 1992–1995, Veres Rivne took part in the Ukrainian Premier League. ==References== == Other websites == * Official website Category:1950s establishments in Ukraine Category:1957 establishments in Europe Category:Ukrainian football clubs
title: NK Veres Rivne
